data.title: Front Range Community College Foundation
data.text:
Providing Opportunities for Students

Since 1994, the Front Range Community College Foundation has worked to advance the mission of FRCC by ensuring students have the resources they need to complete their education.

The FRCC Foundation raises funds to provide scholarships, programmatic support, funding for capital projects, and innovation to ensure students have the necessary financial resources and access to programs that will help them achieve their dreams.

During the fiscal year ending June 30, 2023, the FRCC Foundation provided approximately $1.25 million in scholarships to students and over $150,000 in program support to the College.
